amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of the Congress that negotiations bearing upon missile defenses and/or the viability of the ABM treaty should be suspended until the 104th Congress has had a chance to review the issue.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 39 as printed in the Congressional Record) to express the sense of the Congress that negotiations bearing upon missile defenses and/or the viability of the ABM treaty should be suspended until the 104th Congress has had a chance to review the issue.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 320 - 110 (Roll no. 135).
